values.help: Set all configuration values to default values (factory settings).
values.label: Set to Default

values.help: The time used in mode 2 to turn the sensor off. This Time will start running as soon as detection is seen.
values.label: Mode timeout

values.help: The switch off time will start running as soon as mode timeout is done. Motion sensor is turned on and when movement is detected again the mode timeout (cfg param 1) will start running all over again. When switch off time is done a basic off message is sent to the associated node.
values.label: Switch off time

values.help: Sensitivity value between 0 and 127 (values above 127 will be reported as the set value but will be handled in SW as 127).
values.label: Sensitivity

values.help: The mode that is entered after detection. If mode is 0 or higher then 3, that value will be reported after a get but will be handled in SW as mode 2.
values.label: The mode

items.label: no detection possible. Battery save mode
normal operation mode: send on after detection and off after given time no detection
Z-Wave chip is always on to request e.g. version or manufacturer id

values.help: If a LDR resistance measured lower then this value the returned light percentage is 100%. See chapter light table for more information.
values.label: Light Table 100

values.help: If a LDR resistance measured lower then this value the returned light percentage is 90%. See chapter light table for more information.
values.label: Light Table 90

values.help: If a LDR resistance measured lower then this value the returned light percentage is 80%. See chapter light table for more information.
values.label: Light Table 80

values.help: If a LDR resistance measured lower then this value the returned light percentage is 70%. See chapter light table for more information.
values.label: Light Table 70

values.help: If a LDR resistance measured lower then this value the returned light percentage is 60%. See chapter light table for more information.
values.label: Light Table 60

values.help: If a LDR resistance measured lower then this value the returned light percentage is 50%. See chapter light table for more information.
values.label: Light Table 50

values.help: If a LDR resistance measured lower then this value the returned light percentage is 40%. See chapter light table for more information.
values.label: Light Table 40

values.help: If a LDR resistance measured lower then this value the returned light percentage is 30%. See chapter light table for more information.
values.label: Light Table 30

values.help: If a LDR resistance measured lower then this value the returned light percentage is 20%. See chapter light table for more information.
values.label: Light Table 20

values.help: If a LDR resistance measured lower then this value the returned light percentage is 10%. See chapter light table for more information.
values.label: . Light Table 10
